text:
I took the english faq.xml and translated it.
Note that the page displays wrongly (I think it's because the dtd path, but I'll
apply another patch for that when someone decides how to do it site-wise)

I made the patch with
cvs -u -w faq.xml

the -w to ignore spaces because otherwise the whole file came out in the diff.
There must be a problem with EOLs or something like that.
I'm using jEdit in WinXP to edit the xml files.
creator: agusmba@terra.es
agusmba@terra.es
text:
Created attachment 3279
plain text patch file for faq.xml (spanish)
